amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding for the National Wildlife Refuge System by $500,000 for the Wildlife and Habitat Management of invasive species.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Soto.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
